item.title: Tailblog
item.dc:creator: Ajink Gupta
item.description: TailBlog Tailblog is an open source Blogging Platform written in PHP. You do not need to use a VPS to run Tailblog , shared hosting or even free hosting should work as long as the host supports at least PHP 5.3. Features Admin Panel (upcoming) WYSIWYG editor Categorization with category Static Pages (e.g. Contact Page, About Page) Meta canonical, description, and rich snippets for SEO (upcoming) Multi author support Disqus Comments (optional) Facebook Comments (optional) Google Analytics Modern Responsive Design User Roles Post Draft
item.content:encoded:
TailBlog
Tailblog is an open source Blogging Platform written in PHP.
You do not need to use a VPS to run Tailblog , shared hosting or even free hosting should work as long as the host supports at least PHP 5.3.

Features
Admin Panel (upcoming)
WYSIWYG editor
Categorization with category
Static Pages (e.g. Contact Page, About Page)
Meta canonical, description, and rich snippets for SEO (upcoming)
Multi author support
Disqus Comments (optional)
Facebook Comments (optional)
Google Analytics
Modern Responsive Design
User Roles
Post Draft
